main.name: Dayita Chaudhuri
main.description: I am a Second-Year CSE Undergrad and a full stack web developer. I use React, Angular and Django frameworks to develop pages. This is my resume. Feel free to check it out and leave me your opinion through the contact section.
main.bio: Full Stack Web-Developer and Software Developer with a passion for thoughtful UI/UX and collaboration. I am familiar with a variety of frameworks. Currently working on Machine Learning and AI. My primary goal is to make products that will make a difference.
main.contactmessage: Are you interested in working with me, or do you just wanna meet up for some chitchat? I love meeting and working with new people. Hit me up through the form below.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: Used web technologies and coordinated with an experienced team to build web solutions for teh comany as well as other partner institutions. Got to interact with and learn from professionals working in the field of Software Development for 10+ years.

projects.title: Portfolio Website in ReactJS
projects.category: Portfolio website containing relevant information and a contact form

projects.title: Portfolio Website in Django
projects.category: Portfolio website containing relevant information and a contact form

projects.title: e-Commerce Website
projects.category:
• Developed a working shopping website with an updated catalogue and shopping cart, using Django.
• Technologies used were Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Javascript.
• Backend was handled through Django admin

projects.title: Minesweeper Game in Python
projects.category:
• Developed his game works like any traditional minesweeper game, with three difficulty levels and two modes - single player and multiplayer.
• It has very strong exception handling capabilities.

projects.title: Official Website for DCC-NITA
projects.category:
• Worked with the team of DCC NITA to build and launch the official website.
• Handled the frontend using ReactJS.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
